page.title: 02OUR ESTATE
page.content: We live on the Warwick Estate,a large council estate built about 20 years ago.The houses are built in rows or squares and are named after lakes or trees.Despite the fact that the estate is fairly new much of it is dirty and damaged due to vandalism and lack of care,which is a pity for those people who look after their property.There are often silly fights over petty things.There are no shops in our area of the estate,which is inconvenient, but a wide variety of mobile shops visit each week.There is a working mens club and a bookmakers on the site next to our school.There is a small area of playing fields nearby but there is not a lot on it, much having been destroyed by vandalism. The tennis netting was ripped down, some of the playground equipment burnt and the bowling green dug up.
